About me

My name is Adiar

I am a 3rd year student. I want to work in IT, because I want to do what I love. I constantly study new relevant technologies and grow in my profession.
I love being a developer.
I am an attentive, responsible person, with a high level of self-organization and concentration. I am disciplined, focused on achieving results, constantly striving to master new technologies and working tools.

Skills

What i use at work

HTML5

It is he who creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present

Bootstrap

I studied the library Bootstrap, learned how to use the finished Bootstrap grid for faster adaptive layout on real projects

Figma

I am able to work with this tool for typesetting web pages according to the .FIG layout.

Git

Learned to work with a GIT system. Work with remote and local repositories, work with repository branches...

Gulp

I studied the configuration of the builders for more convenient and quick website development from converting SCSS to CSS, Minification JS file and Image Optimization. Creating a virtual server emulator.

SASS/SCSS

I use SCSS and SASS preprocessor for convenient site styling, nesting of elements, variables and blocking for convenient site support.

Vercel

Vercel enable frontend teams to develop, preview, and ship delightful user experiences, where performance is the default. It is possible to deploy such libraries as - Next.js, React App, SvelteKit, Nuxt.
